projects.title: Business Card Maker
projects.description: Business card maker to store business cards in realtime database. The motivation for this app is to store information about someone related to you preparing for non-face-to-face situations.

projects.title: All In TECH
projects.description: Digital Products e-commerce application using commerce.js and stripe to experience user friendly payment system.

projects.title: CryptoWorld
projects.description: Cryptocurrency website that show users crypcurrencies and related news using coinranking and Bing news API.

projects.title: Thrift Me ( Team Project )
projects.description: Online C2C e-commerce store based out of New Zealand. The platform facilitates second-hand shopping for and selling of preloved, named brand, items of clothing from user to user.

subProjects.title: Movie Studio
subProjects.description: Movie app that shows bunch of movies and implement with detail page. Using GraphQL and Apollo to get movies from the API.

subProjects.title: AI Website
subProjects.description: AI Website built with React and CSS(BEM) to practice user friendly UX/UI desgin.

subProjects.title: Home Auto Controller
subProjects.description: Home Auto Controller is an application to control customers home, manage energy efficiency and security.

subProjects.title: Carrot Picker Game
subProjects.description: Carrot picking game that modularize with game engine and other features. Game engine is implemented with Javascript Class.

subProjects.title: Quiz Gang
subProjects.description: Quiz game application, that user can choose each category of game. Using context API to handle states.

subProjects.title: Twitter Clone
subProjects.description: Simple Twitter clone app that implemented with Authentication and realtime database to show tweets.
